text: Edward W. (Ted) Godwin, (August 13, 1933 - January 3, 2013) was a Canadian artist who was part of the Regina Five, a group of five artists (Ken Lochhead, Art McKay, Ron Bloore and Douglas Morton) all based in Regina, Saskatchewan. He is also known for his large tartan paintings. Born in Calgary, Alberta, he attended the Southern Alberta Institute of Technology and Art from 1951 to 1955. ==Honours== * Officer of the Order of Canada, 2004 * Royal Canadian Academy of Arts ==Notes== ==External links== * Official site * University of Regina exhibition * University of Regina Archives and Special Collections. title: Ted Godwin
